title: Fireside with the Underboss - “He Pulled Up In Front of John’s Club With Hookers and Cocaine”
description: Sammy crossed paths with a lot of Westies during his time as a made man. In this story, he tells us about a particular time when the Westies and Gambino's decided to join forces.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy crossed paths with a lot of Westies during his time as a made man. In this story, he tells us about a particular time when the Westies and Gambino's decided to join forces.
